Veins coverage is not the more the better. In many cases, it is necessary to determine the number of veins covered according to the balance of output and consumption.

A single vein can be covered by multiple mining machines. The more mining machines covering it, the consumption rate is faster.

By continuously upgrade the <color="#FD965ECC">Mineral Utilization Technology</color> in the <color="#FD965ECC">Technology Tree (T), Upgrade section,</color> you can increase the mining speed of mining machines and reduce the loss of veins caused by mining operations.
data_array.fr_fr:
The more veins covered by the mining machine, the gathering speed is faster. Each covered vein provides a basic capacity of <color="#FD965ECC">30/min</color>. The consumption rate of each vein is consistent because the Mining machine consumes the covered veins in turn. When one of the covered veins is exhausted, the production capacity of the mining machine will decrease.

Veins coverage is not the more the better. In many cases, it is necessary to determine the number of veins covered according to the balance of output and consumption.

A single vein can be covered by multiple mining machines. The more mining machines covering it, the consumption rate is faster.

By continuously upgrade the <color="#FD965ECC">Mineral Utilization Technology</color> in the <color="#FD965ECC">Technology Tree (T), Upgrade section,</color> you can increase the mining speed of mining machines and reduce the loss of veins caused by mining operations.

data_array.name: 电网建立指南前字
data_array.zh_cn:
要想让生产设施运行，需要将它接入电网，并且电网内要有发电设施提供电力。

电网中的设施分为<color="#FD965ECC">“发电设施”</color>、<color="#FD965ECC">“用电设施”</color>、<color="#FD965ECC">“蓄电设施”</color>以及<color="#FD965ECC">“输电设施”</color>。

若一个电网中的发电功率＞用电功率，用电设施满负荷运转，剩余的电能将以一定功率存入蓄电设施；
若一个电网中的发电功率＜用电功率，蓄电设施将优先以一定功率放电以填补电力缺口。若所有蓄电器以最大功率放电后，仍无法填补电力缺口，用电设施将因为电力不足而减缓其工作速度。
<color="#FD965ECC">一旦电网中的供电率＜10%，电网将会跳闸，生产设施停止运转。</color>
data_array.en_us:
For production facilities to work, they need to connect to the grid, and there must be power generation facilities in the grid to provide electricity.

There are <color="#FD965ECC">power generation facilities</color>, <color="#FD965ECC">power consumption facilities</color>, <color="#FD965ECC">power storage facilities</color>, and <color="#FD965ECC">power transmission facilities</color> in the power grid.

If the power generation of the power grid is greater than power consumption, the power consumption facilities will run at full load. And the accumulators will store the surplus electricity with a certain power. 
If the power generation of the power grid is less than power consumption, the accumulators will firstly discharge with a certain power to fill the power gap. If still not to fill the power gap after all accumulators automatically discharging at the max power, the power consumption facilities will slow down work speed due to insufficient power.
<color="#FD965ECC">Once the satisfaction of the power grid is less than 10%, the power grid will trip. At the same time, the production facilities will stop working.</color>
data_array.fr_fr:
For production facilities to work, they need to connect to the grid, and there must be power generation facilities in the grid to provide electricity.

There are <color="#FD965ECC">power generation facilities</color>, <color="#FD965ECC">power consumption facilities</color>, <color="#FD965ECC">power storage facilities</color>, and <color="#FD965ECC">power transmission facilities</color> in the power grid.

If the power generation of the power grid is greater than power consumption, the power consumption facilities will run at full load. And the accumulators will store the surplus electricity with a certain power. 
If the power generation of the power grid is less than power consumption, the accumulators will firstly discharge with a certain power to fill the power gap. If still not to fill the power gap after all accumulators automatically discharging at the max power, the power consumption facilities will slow down work speed due to insufficient power.
<color="#FD965ECC">Once the satisfaction of the power grid is less than 10%, the power grid will trip. At the same time, the production facilities will stop working.</color>

data_array.name: 电网建立指南后字
data_array.zh_cn:
前期可以利用风力涡轮机来产生电力。风力涡轮机利用风力发电，不需要消耗燃料，是前期发展非常实用的发电设施。另外，不同行星的风能利用率各不相同。

风力涡轮机自带一定的电力覆盖区域，不过这个区域很小。如果想要扩展电力的供应范围，<color="#FD965ECC">需要使用电力感应塔来进行输电及覆盖。</color>不同的输电设施具有不同的连接长度和覆盖范围，升级科技可以解锁更高级的输电设施。

需要燃料的发电设施将根据实际用电功率来消耗燃料。

你可以点击电力感应塔来查看当前电网的电力信息，根究耗电需求随时进行调整。
打开<color="#FD965ECC">“详情显示(H)”</color>中的<color="#FD965ECC">“电力网络”</color>可以让电力网络常显。
data_array.en_us:
In the early stage, you can use Wind turbines to generate electricity. Wind turbines use wind power to generate electricity and do not need to consume fuels. It is a very practical power generation facility for early development. Besides, different planets have different wind energy ratio.

Wind turbines come with a power supply area, but this area is very small. If you want to expand the power grid's supply range, <color="#FD965ECC">you need to use the Tesla tower to transmit and supply power.</color> Different power transmission facilities have different connection lengths and supply areas. You can unlock more advanced power transmission facilities by upgrading Technology.

Power generation facilities that require fuels will consume fuels based on the actual consumption power.

You can view the current power grid information and adjust it at any time based on the consumption demand by clicking the Tesla tower. Can always display the power network when turn on the <color="#FD965ECC">Power network</color> in the <color="#FD965ECC">Detail display (H)</color>.
data_array.fr_fr:
In the early stage, you can use Wind turbines to generate electricity. Wind turbines use wind power to generate electricity and do not need to consume fuels. It is a very practical power generation facility for early development. Besides, different planets have different wind energy ratio.

Wind turbines come with a power supply area, but this area is very small. If you want to expand the power grid's supply range, <color="#FD965ECC">you need to use the Tesla tower to transmit and supply power.</color> Different power transmission facilities have different connection lengths and supply areas. You can unlock more advanced power transmission facilities by upgrading Technology.

Power generation facilities that require fuels will consume fuels based on the actual consumption power.

You can view the current power grid information and adjust it at any time based on the consumption demand by clicking the Tesla tower. Can always display the power network when turn on the <color="#FD965ECC">Power network</color> in the <color="#FD965ECC">Detail display (H)</color>.

data_array.name: 机甲核心能量前字
data_array.zh_cn:
机甲在移动、采集、建设、合成物品以及使用自带实验室研究科技时，都会消耗核心能量，核心能量条及数值在屏幕正下方显示。

当核心能量不足时，机甲的所有活动都会受到限制，比如移动速度变慢，无法进行研究等，因此你需要随时关注机甲核心能量的使用情况。一旦核心能量不足，可以点击屏幕右下角的<color="#FD965ECC">“机体面板(C)”</color>按钮打开<color="#FD965ECC">“机体信息面板”</color>，向燃料仓内补充燃料。
data_array.en_us:
The mecha consumes core energy when moving, gathering, building, replicate items, and using its lab research technologies. The core energy bar and value are displayed directly below the screen.

When the core energy is insufficient, all activities will be restricted, such as slower move speed and unable to research, etc. So, you need to pay attention to the use of mecha core energy at any time. Once the core energy is insufficient, you can click the <color="#FD965ECC">Mecha panel (C)</color> button at the bottom-right corner of the screen to open the <color="#FD965ECC">Mecha panel</color> and resupply fuel into the fuel chamber.
data_array.fr_fr:
The mecha consumes core energy when moving, gathering, building, replicate items, and using its lab research technologies. The core energy bar and value are displayed directly below the screen.

When the core energy is insufficient, all activities will be restricted, such as slower move speed and unable to research, etc. So, you need to pay attention to the use of mecha core energy at any time. Once the core energy is insufficient, you can click the <color="#FD965ECC">Mecha panel (H)</color> button at the bottom-right corner of the screen to open the <color="#FD965ECC">Mecha panel</color> and resupply fuel into the fuel chamber.

data_array.name: 机甲核心能量后字
data_array.zh_cn:
机甲核心能量的回复主要通过燃烧室将燃料的能量转化为核心能量。燃烧室的功率越大，能量回复的速度也就越快。

前期，采集星球上的树木、植物可以获得<color="#FD965ECC">木材</color>、<color="#FD965ECC">植物燃料</color>这两种初级燃料，<color="#FD965ECC">煤</color>也是一种不错的燃料选择。
高级燃料除了比低级燃料所蕴含的能量更多以外，还会对机甲燃烧室功率有额外提升，使机甲能更快速地回复能量。

除了燃烧室以外，机甲核心还自带一个微弱的供电功率。

你可以将鼠标移动到能量槽右边的数值上查看能量的具体使用细节。
data_array.en_us:
Converting fuel energy into core energy through the Fuel chamber will recover the core energy of the mecha. The Fuel chamber's power is higher, the speed of energy recovery is faster.

In the early stage, gathering trees and plants on the planet can obtain two primary fuels: <color="#FD965ECC">Logs</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Plant fuels</color>. <color="#FD965ECC">Coals</color> are also good fuel choices.
High-grade fuels not only contain more energy than low-grade fuel, but they also increase the mecha fuel power, allowing the mecha to recover energy more quickly.

In addition to the Fuel chamber, the mecha core also comes with a weak power generation.

You can move the mouse to the value at the right of the core energy bar to view the specific usage details.
data_array.fr_fr:
Converting fuel energy into core energy through the Fuel chamber will recover the core energy of the mecha. The Fuel chamber's power is higher, the speed of energy recovery is faster.

In the early stage, gathering trees and plants on the planet can obtain two primary fuels: <color="#FD965ECC">Logs</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Plant fuels</color>. <color="#FD965ECC">Coals</color> are also good fuel choices.
High-grade fuels not only contain more energy than low-grade fuel, but they also increase the mecha fuel power, allowing the mecha to recover energy more quickly.

In addition to the Fuel chamber, the mecha core also comes with a weak power generation.

You can move the mouse to the value at the right of the core energy bar to view the specific usage details.

data_array.name: 矩阵研究站介绍前字
data_array.zh_cn:
矩阵研究站是真实世界与主脑连接的枢纽，它有两种工作模式：“矩阵合成”以及“科研模式”。

矩阵合成模式，是指可以利用研究站来制造超级矩阵。
科研模式，则是消耗超级矩阵来研究科技，只能研究需要超级矩阵才能解锁的科技。

一旦选择科研模式，研究站将会自动研究当前正在进行的项目，所有研究站共享一个研究进度。

<color="#FD965ECC">使用多个研究站来同时研究一项科技，将极大的提升科技的研究速度 !</color>
每个研究站将贡献 <color="#FD965ECC">60hash/s</color> 的基础研究速度，必须放入科技所需的所有矩阵材料才能开始研究。
data_array.en_us:
The Matrix lab is the hub of connecting the real world and the CentreBrain. It has two modes: Matrix and Research.

The Matrix mode is to produce matrices.
The Research mode is to consume the supermatrices to research technologies. And can only research the technologies that require the supermatrices to unlock.

Once select the research mode, the Matrix labs will automatically research the currently ongoing technology, and all Matrix labs share the same research progress.

<color="#FD965ECC">This will greatly increase the research speed by using multiple Matrix labs to research the same technology at the same time!</color>

Each Matrix lab contributes a basic research speed of <color="#FD965ECC">60hash/s</color>. Only you put all the matrices required by the technology into the Matrix lab, it will start research.
data_array.fr_fr:
The Matrix lab is the hub of connecting the real world and the CentreBrain. It has two modes: Matrix and Research.

The Matrix mode is to produce matrices.
The Research mode is to consume the supermatrices to research technologies. And can only research the technologies that require the supermatrices to unlock.

Once select the research mode, the Matrix labs will automatically research the currently ongoing technology, and all Matrix labs share the same research progress.

<color="#FD965ECC">This will greatly increase the research speed by using multiple Matrix labs to research the same technology at the same time!</color>

Each Matrix lab contributes a basic research speed of <color="#FD965ECC">60hash/s</color>. Only you put all the matrices required by the technology into the Matrix lab, it will start research.

data_array.name: 矩阵研究站介绍后字
data_array.zh_cn:
<color="#FD965ECC">矩阵研究站除了可以在行星表面进行平铺建造外，还可以在垂直方向上进行搭建。</color>
垂直建造的研究站，只要在下层供应充足的原材料，研究站便将会自动将原材料传至上层，同时将产物运送回第一层。另外，只用设置任意一层的工作模式，其他层的研究站将会自动同步。

（真实世界中的超级矩阵，可以作为主脑维持家园运行的源代码。通过将超级矩阵上传至主脑，经过主脑解析后，将获得的科技传输回来，维持家园运行的同时，又能促进基地发展。）
data_array.en_us:
<color="#FD965ECC">The Matrix labs can be built on the planet's surface, and can also be built in the vertical direction.</color>
Vertically constructed Matrix labs, only supplying sufficient raw materials on the lower level, the Matrix labs will automatically transport the raw materials to the upper level and transport the products back to the first level at the same time. Also, just set the operating mode of any layer, and the Matrix labs on other layers will automatically synchronize.

(The supermatrices are the source codes of the CentreBrain for maintaining the homeworld. By uploading the supermatrices to the CentreBrain, after the CentreBrain analysis, the obtained technology will be transmitted back. You can benefit from promoting the development of the base by operating the homeworld simultaneously.)
data_array.fr_fr:
<color="#FD965ECC">The Matrix labs can be built on the planet's surface, and can also be built in the vertical direction.</color>
Vertically constructed Matrix labs, only supplying sufficient raw materials on the lower level, the Matrix labs will automatically transport the raw materials to the upper level and transport the products back to the first level at the same time. Also, just set the operating mode of any layer, and the Matrix labs on other layers will automatically synchronize.

(The supermatrices are the source codes of the CentreBrain for maintaining the homeworld. By uploading the supermatrices to the CentreBrain, after the CentreBrain analysis, the obtained technology will be transmitted back. You can benefit from promoting the development of the base by operating the homeworld simultaneously.)

data_array.name: 配方复制操作前字
data_array.zh_cn:
<color="#FD965ECC">每个生产设施都需要设置配方，否则将无法工作。</color>

如果需要给同一类型的建筑设置相同的配方（或设置），可以使用<color="#FD965ECC">[＜]</color>键来复制其中一个已设置好配方的生产设施，之后再用鼠标指向另一个需要设置相同配方的生产设施后，按<color="#FD965ECC">[＞]</color>键，便可以粘贴配方。
data_array.en_us:
<color="#FD965ECC">Each production facility needs to set a recipe. Otherwise, it will not work.</color>

If you need to set the same recipe (or settings) for the same type of building, use the <color="#FD965ECC">[＜]</color> key to copy one of the production facilities that has set the recipe. And then, use the mouse to point to another production facility that needs the same recipe, press <color="#FD965ECC">[＞]</color> key to paste.
data_array.fr_fr:
<color="#FD965ECC">Each production facility needs to set a recipe. Otherwise, it will not work.</color>

If you need to set the same recipe (or settings) for the same type of building, use the <color="#FD965ECC">[＜]</color> key to copy one of the production facilities that has set the recipe. And then, use the mouse to point to another production facility that needs the same recipe, press <color="#FD965ECC">[＞]</color> key to paste.

data_array.name: 传送带和分拣器前字
data_array.zh_cn:
<color="#FD965ECC">有了传送带和分拣器，就可以实现自动化了。</color>

不同的生产设施接口不同，一些可以直接连接传送带，比如采矿机；一些则需要使用分拣器将供货设施和收货设施桥接起来，比如电弧熔炉。你可以使用传送带将采矿机内的矿物运送出来，然后再使用分拣器将传送带和电弧熔炉连接起来，这样分拣器就会自动将传送带上的矿物运送至电弧熔炉里进行冶炼。
data_array.en_us:
<color="#FD965ECC">With Conveyor belts and Sorters, you can achieve full automation now.</color>

Different production facilities have different slots. Some can directly connect to conveyor belts, such as Mining machines. Some use the sorters to bridge supply facilities and receiving facilities, such as Smelters. You can Use the Conveyor belts to transport the ores from the Mining machines, and then use the Sorters to connect the conveyor belts to the smelters. The Sorters can deliver the ores from the Conveyor Belts to the smelters for automatic smelting.
data_array.fr_fr:
<color="#FD965ECC">With Conveyor belts and Sorters, you can achieve full automation now.</color>

Different production facilities have different slots. Some can directly connect to conveyor belts, such as Mining machines. Some use the sorters to bridge supply facilities and receiving facilities, such as Smelters. You can Use the Conveyor belts to transport the ores from the Mining machines, and then use the Sorters to connect the conveyor belts to the smelters. The Sorters can deliver the ores from the Conveyor Belts to the smelters for automatic smelting.

data_array.name: 传送带和分拣器后字
data_array.zh_cn:
在规划传送带时，通过确定建造的起始点和终点来规划传送带线路。

在规划传送带时，<color="#FD965ECC">使用[↑]将目标高度升高一级，使用[↓]将目标高度下降一级，如果需要重置至地面高度，则按[Keypad.0]。</color>

通常情况下，传送带会自动吸附到可搭接的建筑，<color="#FD965ECC">可以按住[SHIFT]键来忽略吸附。</color>
data_array.en_us:
When putting on conveyor belts, all you need to do is determine the Starting point and the Endpoint to plan the conveyor belt route.
When planning the conveyor belt, <color="#FD965ECC">press [↑] to lift the target height one level, and press [↓] to drop down the target height one level. And if you need to reset to the ground height, press [Keypad.0].</color>

Usually, the conveyor belt will automatically snap to the overlapping buildings. <color="#FD965ECC">You can press and hold the [SHIFT] key to ignore the snapping.</color>
data_array.fr_fr:
When putting on conveyor belts, all you need to do is determine the Starting point and the Endpoint to plan the conveyor belt route.
When planning the conveyor belt, <color="#FD965ECC">press [↑] to lift the target height one level, and press [↓] to drop down the target height one level. And if you need to reset to the ground height, press [Keypad.0].</color>

Usually, the conveyor belt will automatically snap to the overlapping buildings. <color="#FD965ECC">You can press and hold the [SHIFT] key to ignore the snapping.</color>

data_array.name: 射线接收站工作机制标题
射线接收站工作机制前字
data_array.zh_cn:
射线接收站可以接收从戴森球（戴森云）上传输回来的高能射线，它有两种不同的模式：<color="#FD965ECC">“直接发电”</color>以及<color="#FD965ECC">“光子生成”</color>。

直接发电模式，是指射线接收站将接收到的能量直接输出到电网。
<color="#FD965ECC">光子生成模式，升级科技“狄拉克逆变机制”后才能解锁。</color>在光子生成模式下，射线接收站的接收功率×8，并会以这一超高的功率将接收到能量直接转化为“临界光子”。

利用微型粒子对撞机可以很容易的将临界光子逆变为反物质和氢，实现将能量作为反物质来存储。
data_array.en_us:
The ray receiver can receive the high-energy Gamma rays transmitted from the Dyson sphere(Dyson swarm). It has two different modes: <color="#FD965ECC">Power generation</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Photon generation</color>. 

Power generation mode means that the ray receiver directly outputs the received energy to the grid. 
<color="#FD965ECC">After upgrading the Dirac inversion mechanism technology, you can unlock the Photon generation mode.</color> Under the Photon generation mode, the receiving power of the ray receiver will be 8 times. Use this ultra-high power can directly convert the received energy into Critical photons. 

The Miniature particle collider can easily convert critical photons into antimatter and hydrogen, realizing energy storage as antimatter.
data_array.fr_fr:
The ray receiver can receive the high-energy Gamma rays transmitted from the Dyson sphere(Dyson swarm). It has two different modes: <color="#FD965ECC">Power generation</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Photon generation</color>. 

Power generation mode means that the ray receiver directly outputs the received energy to the grid. 
<color="#FD965ECC">After upgrading the Dirac inversion mechanism technology, you can unlock the Photon generation mode.</color> Under the Photon generation mode, the receiving power of the ray receiver will be five times. Use this ultra-high power can directly convert the received energy into Critical photons. 

The Miniature particle collider can easily convert critical photons into antimatter and hydrogen, realizing energy storage as antimatter.

data_array.name: 射线接收站工作机制后字
data_array.zh_cn:
高能射线在传输过程中，能量会散失，因此，能量从戴森球传向射线接收站时会有一定的传输效率。可以通过升级科技或者让射线接收站持续工作来提高。

每个射线接收站的基础接收功率为6MW，实际接收功率可以通过持续工作或者消耗引力透镜来提高。当射线接收站因处于星球阴面而接收不到射线时，持续接收的进度将会快速下降。

当持续工作进度达到100%时，接收功率×2.5，能量散失在当前的基础上-40%。
<color="#FD965ECC">当放入引力透镜后，接收功率×2，若引力透镜含有增产点数，则接收功率还会额外提升。</color>此外，在行星电离层应用科技的作用下，有效接收海拔将延伸至大气层顶端，使其在一个昼夜循环中能够有更多的时间接收到高能射线，从而提高持续工作进度。

考虑以上所有加成因素：
<color="#FD965ECC">直接发电模式的理论最大功率为 60MW</color>
<color="#FD965ECC">光子生成模式的理论最大功率为 480MW</color>

射线接收站的实时接收功率按以上原理确定后，它将向戴森球请求能量。
因为接收效率的缘故，请求的功率（实际消耗戴森球的功率） = 当前射线接收站功率 / 当前接收效率
当戴森球的总发电性能无法满足所有射线接收站的请求功率时，将按照请求功率加权来给每个射线接收站分配功率。

无论电网当前的负载如何，射线接收站都会以此时自身能达到的最大功率向戴森球请求能量。
data_array.en_us:
High-energy Gamma rays will lose energy during transmission. Therefore, there is a transmission efficiency when energy is transmitted from the Dyson sphere to the ray receiver. Upgrading technology or letting the ray receiver continue to work can improve the ray transmission efficiency. 

The basic received power of each ray receiver is 6MW. Continuously working or consuming Graviton lens will increase the actual power. When the ray receiver cannot receive rays because it is in the shadow of the planet, the progress of continuous reception will drop rapidly.

When the continuous work progress reaches 100%, the received power becomes 2.5 times, and the energy loss is reduced by 40% on the current basis.
<color="#FD965ECC">When put in the Graviton lens, the receiving power becomes 2 times.</color> Besides, with the application of Planetary ionosphere utilization technology, the effective receiving altitude will extend to the top of the atmosphere. It allows more time to receive high-energy Gamma rays in a day and night cycle, improving the continuous work progress.

Consider all the above bonus factors:
<color="#FD965ECC">The theoretical max power of Power generation mode is 60MW.</color>
<color="#FD965ECC">The theoretical max power of Photon generation mode is 480MW.</color>

After determining the real-time receiving power of the ray receiver according to the above principles, it will request energy from the Dyson sphere.
Because of the receiving efficiency, the Requested power (Actual power consumption on Dyson sphere) = Current ray receiver power / Current receiving efficiency.
The Dyson sphere will allocate the power to each ray receiver according to the requested power weight, When the total power generation performance of the Dyson sphere cannot meet the requested power of all ray receivers.

Besides, the ray receiver will request energy from the Dyson sphere at the max power it can reach at this time, regardless of the current load of the power grid.
data_array.fr_fr:
High-energy Gamma rays will lose energy during transmission. Therefore, there is a transmission efficiency when energy is transmitted from the Dyson sphere to the ray receiver. Upgrading technology or letting the ray receiver continue to work can improve the ray transmission efficiency. 

The basic received power of each ray receiver is 5MW. Continuously working or consuming Graviton lens will increase the actual power. When the ray receiver cannot receive rays because it is in the shadow of the planet, the progress of continuous reception will drop rapidly.

When the continuous work progress reaches 100%, the received power becomes 2.5 times, and the energy loss is reduced by 40% on the current basis.
<color="#FD965ECC">When put in the Graviton lens, the receiving power becomes 2 times.</color> Besides, with the application of Planetary ionosphere utilization technology, the effective receiving altitude will extend to the top of the atmosphere. It allows more time to receive high-energy Gamma rays in a day and night cycle, improving the continuous work progress.

Consider all the above bonus factors:
<color="#FD965ECC">The theoretical max power of Power generation mode is 25MW.</color>
<color="#FD965ECC">The theoretical max power of Photon generation mode is 125MW.</color>

After determining the real-time receiving power of the ray receiver according to the above principles, it will request energy from the Dyson sphere.
Because of the receiving efficiency, the Requested power (Actual power consumption on Dyson sphere) = Current ray receiver power / Current receiving efficiency.
The Dyson sphere will allocate the power to each ray receiver according to the requested power weight, When the total power generation performance of the Dyson sphere cannot meet the requested power of all ray receivers.

Besides, the ray receiver will request energy from the Dyson sphere at the max power it can reach at this time, regardless of the current load of the power grid.

data_array.name: 机甲基本操作前字
data_array.zh_cn:
使用[W][S][A][D]方向键控制机甲移动，或者用[鼠标右键]点击空地，向机甲发出移动指令。

单击[SPACE]键，可以使机甲跳跃。

机甲在移动过程中若遇到水面，将会自动进入滑行状态。在滑行状态下，机甲会比在陆地上移动消耗更多的能量。
data_array.en_us:
Use the [W] [S] [A] [D] direction keys to control the movement of the mecha, or use the [Right mouse button] to click on the destination to send a move command to the mecha.

Click the [SPACE] button to make the mecha jump.

If the mecha encounters water during its movement, it will automatically enter the drift state. In the drift state, the mecha consumes more energy than moving on land.
data_array.fr_fr:
Use the [W] [S] [A] [D] direction keys to control the movement of the mecha, or use the [Right mouse button] to click on the destination to send a move command to the mecha.

Click the [SPACE] button to make the mecha jump.

If the mecha encounters water during its movement, it will automatically enter the drift state. In the drift state, the mecha consumes more energy than moving on land.

data_array.name: 机甲基本操作后字
data_array.zh_cn:
在解锁“驱动引擎等级1”获得飞行能力后，<color="#FD965ECC">双击[SPACE]键</color>可以使机甲升空。然后使用[W][S][A][D]方向键控制机甲低空飞行。在飞行模式下，机甲的移动速度将会提高150%，消耗的能量增加。

在飞行过程中，按<color="#FD965ECC">[SPACE]键</color>可以使飞行高度上升，按<color="#FD965ECC">[ALT]</color>键可以使飞行高度下降，或让机甲返回陆地。

在解锁“驱动引擎等级2”获得航行能力后，在飞行模式下，<color="#FD965ECC">按住[前进方向]和[SPACE]键</color>使机甲持续升空，当达到一定高度时将会进入航行模式。
data_array.en_us:
After unlocking Drive Engine Level 1, you obtain flying ability. <color="#FD965ECC">Double-click the [SPACE] key</color> to lift off, and then use the [W] [S] [A] [D] to control mecha flying at low altitude. The moving speed will increase by 150% with more energy consumed under Flight Mode.

During the flight, press the <color="#FD965ECC">[SPACE]</color> key to increase the flight altitude, press the <color="#FD965ECC">[ALT]</color> key to decrease the flight altitude or return the mecha to the ground during the flight.

After unlocking the Drive Engine Level 2, you obtain the sailing ability. <color="#FD965ECC">Keep pressing the [Forward key] and [SPACE] key</color> in the Flight Mode, and you will enter the Sailing Mode when you reach a certain altitude.
data_array.fr_fr:
After unlocking Drive Engine Level 1, you obtain flying ability. <color="#FD965ECC">Double-click the [SPACE] key</color> to lift off, and then use the [W] [S] [A] [D] to control mecha flying at low altitude. The moving speed will increase by 150% with more energy consumed under Flight Mode.

During the flight, press the <color="#FD965ECC">[SPACE]</color> key to increase the flight altitude, press the <color="#FD965ECC">[ALT]</color> key to decrease the flight altitude or return the mecha to the ground during the flight.

After unlocking the Drive Engine Level 2, you obtain the sailing ability. <color="#FD965ECC">Keep pressing the [Forward direction] and [SPACE] keys</color> in the Flight Mode, and you will enter the Sailing Mode when you reach a certain altitude.

data_array.name: 机甲航行操作前字
data_array.zh_cn:
在航行模式下：

鼠标默认为锁定的状态，可以使用<color="#FD965ECC">[TAB]</color>键来切换鼠标锁定；
按住[前方向键]可以使机甲航行方向转向镜头正前方；
<color="#FD965ECC">按住[SHIFT]键可以让机甲加速，[后方向键]让机甲减速；</color>
使用[Q][R]键来进行左右侧飞，按住[鼠标右键]拖动可以侧向翻滚镜头。

另外，在航行过程中，可以跟随太空导航中的箭头标识方向控制机甲前往不同的行星或星系。

data_array.name: 机甲航行操作后字
data_array.zh_cn:
在解锁“驱动引擎等级4”后，将会获得曲速飞行的能力，可以在短时间内跨越星系间的距离。
若要进行曲速飞行，需要先准备充足的能量以及“空间翘曲器”。

空间翘曲器是机甲曲速飞行必备的消耗品，当脱离行星引力范围后，可以使用<color="#FD965ECC">[CAPSLOCK]</color>键开启或关闭曲速飞行。每次开启曲速飞行除了会消耗大量的能量外，还将会额外消耗<color="#FD965ECC">1个空间翘曲器</color>。
data_array.en_us:
After unlocking Drive Engine Level 4, you will gain the ability to warp, and you can cross the distance between galaxies in a short time.
If you want to warp, you need to prepare sufficient energy and Space Warpers.

The Space Warpers are necessary consumable for the mecha warp. When you are out of the planetary gravitational range, you can use the <color="#FD965ECC">[CAPSLOCK]</color> key to turn on the warp. Each time you turn it on, it will consume a great amount of energy and <color="#FD965ECC">an additional Space Warper</color>.
data_array.fr_fr:
After unlocking Drive Engine Level 4, you will gain the ability to warp, and you can cross the distance between galaxies in a short time.
If you want to warp, you need to prepare sufficient energy and Space Warpers.

The Space Warpers are necessary consumable for the mecha warp. When you are out of the planetary gravitational range, you can use the <color="#FD965ECC">[CAPSLOCK]</color> key to turn on the warp. Each time you turn it on, it will consume a great amount of energy and <color="#FD965ECC">an additional Space Warper</color>.

data_array.name: 自动集装机前字
data_array.zh_cn: 自动集装机能够极大程度提升传送带的运载量，它有高低两个传送带接口，在电力供应充足的情况下，<color="#FD965ECC">当货物从低的传送带入口连续输入时，它将会自动将两个货物集装成一个货物，并从高的传送带接口输出，货物的最大集装数量为4。</color>
data_array.en_us: The Automatic Piler can greatly increase the capacity of conveyor belt. When the power supply is sufficient, <color="#FD965ECC">It will automatically stack 2 consecutive incoming cargo from the low port and output 1 stacked cargo at the high port. The maximum cargo stack count is 4.</color>
data_array.fr_fr: The Automatic Piler can greatly increase the efficiency of cargo transfer. When the power supply is sufficient, <color="#FD965ECC">It will automatically pack 2 consecutive incoming cargo from the low port and output 1 aggregate cargo at the high port. The maximum number of packages per aggregate cargo is 4.</color>

data_array.name: 喷涂机和增产剂工作机制标题
喷涂机和增产剂工作机制前字
data_array.zh_cn:
喷涂机和增产剂会极大地提高生产线的产量，可以将喷涂机直接搭建在有货物运输的传送带上（或者把货物输入传送带连接至喷涂机），<color="#FD965EB0">并将增产剂从上方口输入到喷涂机</color>，这样当下方传送带上的货物经过时，喷涂机将会自动喷涂增产剂。

物品喷涂增产剂后，将会获得<color="#FD965EB0">“增产点数”，增产剂效果也将由增产点数直接决定。</color>
不同的增产点数，“额外产出”或者“加速生产”的效果也不同。

增产剂类型  增产点数  加速生产  额外产出  额外耗电
MK.I                   1                   25.00%       12.50%          30%
MK.II                  2                  50.00%       20.00%         70%
─                      3                  75.00%       22.50%          110%
MK.III                 4                  100.00%     25.00%          150%
data_array.en_us:
The Spray Coater and Proliferator can greatly increase the production line efficiency. Set up the Spray coater on or connect to the conveyor belt, <color="#FD965EB0">input the Proliferator into it</color>, so that the Proliferator can be automatically sprayed when the cargo of the conveyor belt pass by.

Items that have been sprayed with Proliferator will receive <color="#FD965EB0">"Proliferator Point". The effect of the Proliferator will also be directly determined by the Proliferator Point.</color> 
Proliferator Point affect the effect of "Extra Products" and "Production Speedup".

Proliferator Type     Proliferator point     Speed up     Productivity     Power Consumption
MK.I                          1                               +25.00%      +12.50%           +30%
MK.II                         2                              +50.00%      +20.00%          +70%
─                             3                              +75.00%      +22.50%           +110%
MK.III                        4                              +100.00%    +25.00%           +150%
data_array.fr_fr:
The Spray Coater and Proliferator can greatly increase the production line efficiency. Set up the Spray coater on or connect to the conveyor belt, <color="#FD965ECC">input the Proliferator into it</color>, so that the Proliferator can be automatically sprayed when the cargo of the conveyor belt pass by.

Items that have been sprayed with Proliferator will receive <color="#FD965ECC">"Proliferator Point". The effect of the Proliferator will also be directly determined by the Proliferator Point.</color> 
Proliferator Point affect the effect of "Extra Products" and "Production Speedup".

Proliferator Type     Proliferator point     Speed up     Productivity     Power Consumption
MK.I                          1                               +25.00%      +12.50%           +30%
MK.II                         2                              +50.00%      +20.00%          +70%
─                             3                              +75.00%      +22.50%           +110%
MK.III                        4                              +100.00%    +25.00%           +150%

data_array.name: 喷涂机和增产剂工作机制后字
data_array.zh_cn:
不是所有物品喷涂增产剂后都能获得额外产出的效果，部分物品会获得其他效果，如：

<color="#FD965EB0">若该物品用于矩阵研究站的科研模式，则喷涂的增产剂后有产出额外哈希块的效果；
若该物品用于射线接收站，则喷涂的增产剂后可以提高射线接收站的最大输出；
若该物品是反物质燃料棒时，则喷涂的增产剂后可以提高设施的发电功率；
若该物品是一般燃料，则喷涂的增产剂后可以提高热值。</color>

你可以将鼠标移到物品上查看增产剂效果的详细细节。

若一次生产过程要想获得额外产出或者加速生产，就需要对生产这种产物的每一种原材料喷涂增产剂以获得增产点数。

在一次生产过程中，只要有一种原材料没有获得增产点数，整个生产过程将无法被加速或者额外产出。
在一次生产过程中，需要每一种原材料都有额外产出的增产点数，并在相应的生产设施中选择“额外产出”，这样整个生产过程才能够额外产出产物。

当喷涂增产剂后的物品作为原材料生产下一级产物时，将会大幅度增加生产设施的工作功率，产生额外的电力消耗。
data_array.en_us:
However, there are some items that do not get the effect of extra product, but only get speedup production or get other effects. For example:

<color="#FD965EB0">Items for research mode of the Matrix Lab: produces extra hashes
Items for Ray Receiver: the maximum output can be further increased.
Antimatter Fuel Rod: increase the generation capacity of the power generation facility.
General fuel: more energy can be produced.</color>

Hover over the item to see the effect of the Proliferator.

Spraying Proliferator on all raw materials and gain Proliferator Point will enable an production process with Production Speedup or Extra Products.

As long as one raw material does not gain Proliferator Point, the whole production process will not gain Production Speedup or Extra Products.
The entire production process can gain extra product only if each raw material has Proliferator Point and choose a Proliferator Effect in the corresponding production facility.

When the Items that have been sprayed with Proliferator as raw materials to produce the next level of products, it will significantly increase the work consumption of the production facility.
data_array.fr_fr:
However, there are some items that do not get the effect of extra product, but only get speedup production or get other effects. For example:

<color="#FD965ECC">Items for research mode of the Matrix Lab: produces extra hashes
Items for Ray Receiver: the maximum output can be further increased.
Antimatter Fuel Rod: increase the generation capacity of the power generation facility.
General fuel: more energy can be produced.</color>

Hover over the item to see the effect of the Proliferator.

Spraying Proliferator on all raw materials and gain Proliferator Point will enable an production process with Production Speedup or Extra Products.

As long as one raw material does not gain Proliferator Point, the whole production process will not gain Production Speedup or Extra Products.
The entire production process can gain extra product only if each raw material has Proliferator Point and choose a Proliferator Effect in the corresponding production facility.

When the Items that have been sprayed with Proliferator as raw materials to produce the next level of products, it will significantly increase the work consumption of the production facility.

data_array.name: 沙盒模式指引前字
data_array.zh_cn: 在沙盒模式中，有一些方便实用的工具帮助大家抛开限制，释放想象力，在这个宇宙自由地穿梭和探索。
data_array.en_us: In the sandbox mode, there are some convenient and practical tools to help players unleash imagination, free to build, and freely travel and explore this universe.

data_array.name: 沙盒模式指引后字
data_array.zh_cn:
点击机甲“能量槽”右边的<color="#FD965EB0">∞</color>图标可以锁定机甲核心能量。

在<color="#FD965EB0">科技树</color>中点击“一键解锁”按钮可以一键解锁绝大部分科技，或者点击某个科技界面上的“直接解锁（沙盒）”按钮直接解锁该科技。

在<color="#FD965EB0">合成器</color>中开启“直接获得”功能后，可以直接制造该物品而无需原材料。
开启“按组获得”后，将会以“一组”物品的数量进行增加或减少所需制造物品的数量。
点击“获得常用物品”可以获得所有常用物品各一组。
点击“清空机甲背包”可以清除背包内所有物品。

在<color="#FD965EB0">沙盒模式工具(6)</color>中，可以进行快速建造，开启快速建造功能后，建造建筑将不再需要建设无人机。
<color="#FD965EBB">考虑到一次性大量建造可能会带来卡顿，可以手动设置每逻辑帧建造的设施数量。</color>

在<color="#FD965EB0">行星视图</color>中，长按[鼠标右键]可以快速移动至当前星球的任意目标位置。
在<color="#FD965EB0">星图</color>中，可以选中目标行星进行快速移动，或者长按[鼠标右键]快速移动至行星系中任意位置。

在<color="#FD965EB0">沙盒工具</color>中，可以自定义矿脉的位置和储量，使用<color="#FD965EB0">[鼠标左键]</color>在陆地上生成矿脉，<color="#FD965EB0">[R]</color>键旋转矿脉。
利用“植被工具”，使用<color="#FD965EB0">[鼠标左键]</color>可以在地表种植本地植被以及其他各种植被。
使用“地表移除工具”可以移除地表的植被和矿物。

使用<color="#FD965EB0">流速监测器</color>可以直接在传送带上生成/消耗某种货物，不过必须在“货物过滤”中进行设置，以及设置监测周期和目标流量来控制货物生成/消耗的速度。
例如：当前“货物过滤”选择为光栅石，并且选择了生成货物，监测周期为1秒，目标流量为60个，那么通电后该流速监测器会以60个/秒的速度向传送带上生成光栅石。

在<color="#FD965EB0">戴森球面板</color>中，可以启用“自动快速建造”功能，启用后会自动建造规划好的戴森云或戴森球，而不需要发射太阳帆或小型运载火箭。可以启用“太阳帆无限寿命”，点击图标，太阳帆的寿命设定为无限。<color="#FD965EB0">除非手动删除太阳帆，否则无法更改设定。</color>

在太空中飞行时，手持<color="#FD965EB0">太阳帆</color>，按<color="#FD965EB0">[鼠标左键]</color>可以将太阳帆手动建造成戴森云。

在<color="#FD965EB0">电磁轨道弹射器</color>面板和<color="#FD965EB0">垂直发射井</color>面板中，可以启用“十倍射速”。

在<color="#FD965EB0">人造恒星</color>面板中，可以启用“百倍发电”，人造恒星将以百倍基础发电功率进行发电。

在<color="#FD965EB0">物流运输站</color>面板中，点击货物图标右上角的锁定角标可以锁定该种货物的数量。

在<color="#FD965EB0">环境改造（9）</color>中，点击沙土图标右下角的<color="#FD965EB0">∞</color>图标可以获取无限的沙土。
点击“一键铺满地基”可以将当前星球表面铺满地基。
点击“一键还原地形”可以将当前星球的地形与植被还原至初始形态。
data_array.en_us:
Click the <color="#FD965EB0">∞</color> icon at the right of the core energy bar to lock the Core Energy of Mecha.

In <color="#FD965EB0">Technology Tree</color>, click "One-click Unlock" button Will unlock most of the technologies with one-click, Or click the "Unlock Directly (Sandbox)" button on a technology interface to directly unlock it.

In <color="#FD965EB0">Replicator</color>, can directly replicate items without raw materials after turning on "Free Items". 
After turning on "By Stack", will increase or decrease the number of items required to be replicated by the quantity of a "set" of items.
Click "Get Common Items" to get a set of full-stacked commonly used items. 
click "Remove Inventory Items" to remove all items in the inventory.

In <color="#FD965EB0">Sandbox Tools(6)</color>, you can Quick Build. When Quick Build is enabled, construction will no longer require the drones.
<color="#FD965EBB">Considering that a large number of constructions may cause performance issues, the amount of facilities built per logical frame can be set manually.</color>

In <color="#FD965EB0">Planet View</color>, press and hold [Right mouse button] to fast travelling to any place on current planet.
In <color="#FD965EB0">Starmap</color>, it is available to fast travelling to a selected planet or to any place in current planetary system by press and hold [Right mouse button].

In <color="#FD965EB0">Sandbox Tools</color>, you can customize the location and reserves of ore veins. Click <color="#FD965EB0">[Left mouse button]</color> to generate vein on the ground, press <color="#FD965EB0">[R]</color> to rotate vein.
You can use "Vegetation Plant" to plant vegetation, click <color="#FD965EB0">[Left mouse button]</color> to plant vegetation on the ground.
You can use "Remove Vein/Vegetation" to remove the vein or vegetation on the ground. 

You can Generate/Consume selected items on the Conveyor Belt by <color="#FD965EB0">Monitor</color>. You have to select the item you want to Generate/Consume in "Item Filter", and set Monitor Cycle and Target Flow to control the speed of generation/removal.
For example, Currently you select Optical Grating Crystal in "Item Filter" and you select generate items, the Monitor Cycle is 1 second and the target flow is 60, then this Monitor will generate Optical Grating Crystal to Conveyor Belt with a speed of 60/s.

In <color="#FD965EB0">Dyson Sphere Panel</color>, you can enable Quick Build. After enabling it will automatically build Dyson Swarm or Dyson Sphere while you do not have to eject solar sail or launch small carrier rocket. you can enable Enternal Solar Sail, once click the icon, the solar sails on this Dyson Sphere is eternal.<color="#FD965EB0">Cannot change the setting unless you manually remove the solar sails.</color>

When sailing in the space, take <color="#FD965EB0">Solar Sail</color>, press <color="#FD965EB0">[Left mouse button]</color> to manually build Dyson Swarm.

In <color="#FD965EB0">EM-Rail Ejector</color> panel and <color="#FD965EB0">Vertical Launching Silo</color> panel, you can enable 10x eject/launch speed.

In <color="#FD965EB0">Artificial Star</color> panel, you can enable 100x power generation, the artificial star will generate electricity at a 100x the basic power generation.

In <color="#FD965EB0">Logistic Station</color> panel, click the lock icon in the bottom right corner of the cargo icon to lock the amount of it.

In <color="#FD965EB0">Environment Modification (9)</color>, click <color="#FD965EB0">∞</color> icon in the upper right corner of the sand icon to get infinite sand.
Click "Reform Full Planet" to cover this planet with foundation.
Click "Restore Full Planet" to revert the terrain and vegetation to initial state.

data_array.name: 物流配送器指引前字
data_array.zh_cn:
物流配送器极大地方便了伊卡洛斯对各种物品的取用。<color="#61D8FFB0">将物流配送器建造在储物仓上</color>，放入配送运输机，可以对同一星球上的伊卡洛斯，或其他物流配送器进行物品配送。

实现向伊卡洛斯配送的功能，需要：
1.设置物流配送器
打开物流配送器，设置需要配送的物品（例如铁块），勾选<color="#FFFFFF80">【向伊卡洛斯配送】</color>（默认已勾选）。放入配送运输机，并确认储物仓内有铁块。
2.设置物流清单
按【E】打开物品清单，点击左侧的物流清单并选择铁块。滑动拉条左侧设置需求数量的<color="#61D8FFB0">下限</color>，当物品清单内的铁块数量少于需求下限，物流配送器会自动派出运输机进行<color="#61D8FFB0">补充</color>；滑动拉条右侧设置需求数量的<color="#FD965EB0">上限</color>，当铁块数量多于需求上限，物流配送器会回收<color="#FD965EB0">多余</color>的铁块。
data_array.en_us:
Logistics distributor is greatly convenient for Icarus picking up items. <color="#61D8FFB0">Set up logistics distributor on the storage</color>, put in logistics bots, then they can transport items to Icarus on the same planet or other logistics distributors.

To implement distribution to Icarus, need to:
1. Set up logistics distributor
Open a logistics distributor, set up items(e.g. iron ingot), check [<color="#FFFFFF80">Distribute to Icarus</color>] (checked by default). Put in logistics bots and make sure there are iron ingots in the stroage.
2. Set up logistics list 
Press [E] to open Inventory, click the logistics list on the left side and choose "iron ingot". Slide the left part of bar to establish <color="#61D8FFB0">the lower limit</color> of the amount range. When the amount of iron ingots in the Inventory is less than lower limit, logistics distributor would automatically send logistics bots to <color="#61D8FFB0">provide items</color>. Slide the right part of bar to establish <color="#FD965EB0">the upper limit</color> of the amount range. When the the amount of iron ingots in the Inventory is more than upper limit, logistics distributor collect <color="#FD965EB0">extra</color> iron ingots from Icarus.

data_array.name: 物流配送器指引后字
data_array.zh_cn:
物流配送器也可以向伊卡洛斯仅供货，或者仅回收。只需将配送模式切换为【<color="#61D8FFB0">向伊卡洛斯供应</color>】，或【<color="#FD965EB0">从伊卡洛斯回收</color>】。如果勾选了【<color="#FD965EB0">不限回收类型</color>】，物流配送器将回收伊卡洛斯所有需要回收的物品，同时停止向其他物流配送器配送。

物流配送器之间还可以实现物品互传。需要将两个物流配送器都勾选【<color="#FFFFFF80">向其他配送器配送</color>】并将过滤器设置为相同物品，然后将物流配送器A切换为【<color="#61D8FFB0">向其他配送器供应</color>】，物流配送器B切换为【<color="#FD965EB0">“向其他配送器需求”</color>】，则可实现从A到B的自动配送。反之亦然。

如果物流配送器没有设置过滤器，可以点击【<color="#61D8FFB0">智能猜测</color>】自动设置过滤器：

智能猜测会优先检查储物仓内的物品，<color="#FD965EB0">如果储物仓中有单一的物品</color>，智能猜测会把过滤器设置为该物品。
当储物仓中没有物品，智能猜测会检查<color="#FD965EB0">即将进入储物仓的物品</color>。例如一个储物仓上连接了3个输入储物仓的分拣器，把这些分拣器的过滤器设置为同一物品，智能猜测会将物流配送器的过滤器设置为该物品。
如果储物仓中既没有物品，又没有即将进入储物仓的物品，可以在与储物仓连接的传送带上留下<color="#FD965EB0">单一图标</color>，智能猜测此时会将过滤器设置为该图标。

当配送运输机送回的物品无法存入储物仓时，会暂时<color="#FF5D4CB0">滞留</color>在物流配送器里。滞留物品会自动转入储物仓的剩余空间，也可手动取出。
data_array.en_us:
Logistics distributor can also only provide to or only collect from Icarus. Just change the mode into [<color="#61D8FFB0">Provide to Icarus</color>], or [<color="#FD965EB0">Collect from Icarus</color>]. If checked [<color="#FD965EB0">Collect all types</color>], logistics distributor would collect all types of items those need to be collected. Meanwhile, it would stop to distribute items to other logistics distributors.

Logistics distributors can also transport items to each other. Just check [<color="#FFFFFF80">Distribute to other distributors</color>] and set up the filter as the same item. Then change the mode of logistics distributor A to [<color="#61D8FFB0">Provide to other distributors</color>] and change the mode of logistics distributor B to [<color="#FD965EB0">Request from other distributors</color>], the automatic distribution from A to B can be realized, and vice versa.

If the filter is not set up, you can click [<color="#61D8FFB0">Guess Filter</color>] to set it up automatically:

Items in storage would be checked firstly. <color="#FD965EB0">If there is only one type of item in the storage</color>, guess filter would set the filter as this item.
When there is no item in the storage, guess filter would check the <color="#FD965EB0">upcoming items</color>. For instance, there are 3 sorters connected to a storage and they put items in the storage. Set the filter of these sorters as the same item, guess filter would set the filter of distributor as this item.
If there is neither item nor upcoming item for a storage, you can set a <color="#FD965EB0">memo</color> on the conveyor belt connected to the storage. Then the filter would be set as this memo. 

When the items carried by logistics bots cannot be stored in a storage, they would <color="#FF5D4CB0">remain</color> in the logistics distributor. Remaining items can be automatically transferred to the storage and they can also be manually taken out.

Realize Metadata to unlock technology directly.
You can also realize the Metadata separately in the Metadata Panel as corresponding matrices, and research in the matrix lab.

data_array.fr_fr:
The current player is inconsistent with current save file creator.
This cluster will not contribute any Metadata.

data_array.name: 元数据系统作弊提示

data_array.fr_fr:
The current game statistics are abnormal.
This cluster has stopped contributing Metadata.

data_array.name: 新游戏元数据提示描述
data_array.zh_cn:
游戏过程中将产生元数据资产，可供不同星区地址的下一局游戏使用。

注意：同一星区地址建立的不同存档贡献的元数据按最大值计算。
data_array.en_us:
Metadata property will be obtained during the game which can be used in the next game with a different cluster address.

Note: Metadata contributions by gamesaves created by the same cluster address will be calculated at the maximum value.
data_array.fr_fr:
Metadata property will be obtained during the game which can be used in the next game with a different cluster address.

Note: Metadata contributions by gamesaves created by the same cluster address will be calculated at the maximum value.

data_array.name: 元数据提取提示描述
data_array.zh_cn: 将元数据<color="#FD965ECC">1:1</color>提取为对应矩阵并加入背包。
data_array.en_us: Realize Metadata <color="#FD965ECC">1:1</color> as matrices and sent them to the inventory.
data_array.fr_fr: Realize Metadata <color="#FD965ECC">1:1</color> as matrices and sent them to the inventory.

data_array.name: 元数据详情描述
data_array.zh_cn:
生产超级矩阵，按每分钟产量来获取相应数量的元数据。
元数据可以在下一局游戏（不同星区地址）用于直接解锁科技或提取为超级矩阵。
data_array.en_us:
Metadata can be obtained by producing Matrices at the Matrices yield per minute.
Metadata can be used in the next game (different cluster address) to buyout technology directly or Realize as Matrix.
data_array.fr_fr:
Metadata can be obtained by producing Matrices at the Matrices yield per minute.
Metadata can be used in the next game (different cluster address) to buyout technology directly or Realize as Matrix.

data_array.name: 元数据计算规则描述
data_array.zh_cn:
-  以最近一小时内各类矩阵的 <color="#FD965EBB">每分钟产量</color> x <color="#FD965EBB">星区倍率 %</color> 来计算元数据产出。
-  元数据可以用来在科技树中直接<color="#FD965EBB">买断科技</color>。也可以被提取为矩阵并放入物品清单。
-  本星区地址产出的元数据只可以在其他星区地址建立的游戏存档中使用。
-  部分成就在提取了元数据后将无法在本局游戏中解锁。
-  元数据目前<color="#FD965EBB">暂不支持云存档</color>

例：在1小时产量图中，结构矩阵的产量为1800/min，则会生成元结构1800点（假设星区产出为 100%） 如果之后结构矩阵的产量升到2000/min，那么将继续获得200点元结构。如果在下一存档中使用了500点元结构，那么就还剩下1500点可以使用。

例：两个存档使用了同一个星区地址，结构矩阵的产量分别为900/min和1800/min，则将以1800/min为准，且这两个存档都不可使用这1800点元结构。
data_array.en_us:
-  Calculate Metadata output by the recent one-hour <color="#FD965EBB">production of Matrices per minute</color> x <color="#FD965EBB">Cluster Multiplier %</color>.
-  Metadata can <color="#FD965EBB">buyout technology</color> directly in the technology tree,they can be realized as matrices and sent them to the inventory as well.
-  Metadata produced in current cluster address can only be consumed in gamesaves created in other cluster address.
-  Some achievements cannot be unlocked if Metadata is realized. 
-  <color="#FD965EBB">Cloud Save is not supported yet</color> for Metadata.

Example: If the output of Structure matrix is 1800/min in one-hour production histogram, then 1800 Meta-Structure will be produced.(assume the multiplier is 100%) If the output of Structure matrix reaches at 2000/min later, then another 200 Meta-Structure will be issued. If 500 Meta-Structure are consumed, then there are 1500 Meta-Structure available.

Example: If there are 2 gamesave sharing the same cluster address, the output of Structure matrix is 900/min and 1800/min. Then 1800 Meta-Structure will be produced and none of them can consume it.
data_array.fr_fr:
-  Calculate Metadata output by the recent one-hour <color="#FD965EBB">production of Matrices per minute</color> x <color="#FD965EBB">Cluster Multiplier %</color>.
-  Metadata can <color="#FD965EBB">buyout technology</color> directly in the technology tree,they can be realized as matrices and sent them to the inventory as well.
-  Metadata produced in current cluster address can only be consumed in gamesaves created in other cluster address.
-  Some achievements cannot be unlocked if Metadata is realized. 
-  <color="#FD965EBB">Cloud Save is not supported yet</color> for Metadata.

Example: If the output of Structure matrix is 1800/min in one-hour production histogram, then 1800 Meta-Structure will be produced.(assume the multiplier is 100%) If the output of Structure matrix reaches at 2000/min later, then another 200 Meta-Structure will be issued. If 500 Meta-Structure are consumed, then there are 1500 Meta-Structure available.

Example: If there are 2 gamesave sharing the same cluster address, the output of Structure matrix is 900/min and 1800/min. Then 1800 Meta-Structure will be produced and none of them can consume it.

data_array.name: 总数据描述
data_array.zh_cn:
当前积累的元数据总量。
等于从各个星区中获得的元数据总量减去各个存档中已提取的总量。

注意：元数据目前<color="#FD965EBB">暂不支持云存档</color>
data_array.en_us:
Current amount of Metadata.
It equals the amount of Metadata minus the amount of used Metadata in every gamesave.

Note: <color="#FD965EBB">Cloud Save is not supported yet</color> for Metadata.
data_array.fr_fr:
Current amount of Metadata.
It equals the amount of Metadata minus the amount of used Metadata in every gamesave.

Note: <color="#FD965EBB">Cloud Save is not supported yet</color> for Metadata.

data_array.name: 该星团可使用描述
data_array.zh_cn:
当前可立即使用的元数据。
由于不能使用当前星区贡献的元数据，所以这个数量等于<color="#FD965EBB">剩余总量</color>减去<color="#FD965EBB">当前星区地址贡献量</color>。

使用过<color="#FD965EBB">沙盒模式工具</color>则无法使用元数据。
data_array.en_us:
Current amount of Metadata which is available in current gamesave. 
Since you cannot use the Metadata contributed by current cluster address, it equals <color="#FD965EBB">net amount</color> minus <color="#FD965EBB">current cluster address contribution</color>.

Cannot realize Metadata if <color="#FD965EBB">Sandbox Tools</color> were used.
data_array.fr_fr:
Current amount of Metadata which is available in current gamesave. 
Since you cannot use the Metadata contributed by current cluster address, it equals <color="#FD965EBB">total amount</color> minus <color="#FD965EBB">current cluster address contribution</color>.

data_array.name: 该存档贡献描述
data_array.zh_cn:
在当前游戏中，以最近一小时内<color="#FD965EBB">每分钟产量</color> x <color="#FD965EBB">星区倍率 %</color> 来计算当前游戏的元数据贡献。

若当前游戏使用了新的星区地址，则可直接获得全部元数据；
否则该贡献值需要超过该星区地址中所有存档曾经达到过的最大值，才能继续获得元数据。

例如：有两个存档使用了同一个星区地址，存档1的产量为1200/min，存档2的产量为1800/min，那么这时星区已贡献1800点元数据。如果继续游玩存档1，矩阵产量需要超过1801/min，才能继续获得元数据。
data_array.en_us:
In current gamesave, the Metadata output is calculated by the recent one-hour <color="#FD965EBB">production of Matrices per minute</color> x <color="#FD965EBB">Cluster Multiplier %</color>.

If current gamesave is with a new cluster address, all Metadata can be obtained; 
otherwise the contribution must be larger than every gamesave with the same cluster address, then you can continue to receive Metadata.

Example:  If there are 2 gamesave sharing the same cluster address, the output of Structure matrix in save 1 is 1200/min and  the output of Structure matrix in save 2 is 1800/min. Then the current cluster contribution is 1800. If you continue to play save 1, the matrix output needs to exceed 1801/min to continue obtaining metadata.
data_array.fr_fr:
In current gamesave, the Metadata output is calculated by the recent one-hour <color="#FD965EBB">production of Matrices per minute</color> x <color="#FD965EBB">Cluster Multiplier %</color>.

If current gamesave is with a new cluster address, all Metadata can be obtained; 
otherwise the contribution must be larger than every gamesave with the same cluster address, then you can continue to receive Metadata.

Example:  If there are 2 gamesave sharing the same cluster address, the output of Structure matrix in save 1 is 1200/min and  the output of Structure matrix in save 2 is 1800/min. Then the current cluster contribution is 1800. If you continue to play save 1, the matrix output needs to exceed 1801/min to continue obtaining metadata.

data_array.name: 该星团贡献描述
data_array.zh_cn:
在<color="#FD965EBB">当前星区地址</color>中，以所有存档生产矩阵的每分钟产量最大值来获得元数据。

例：在当前星区中有2个存档，矩阵的产量分别为900/min和1800/min，那么当前星区将贡献1800点元数据。
data_array.en_us:
With <color="#FD965EBB">current cluster address</color>, obtain Metadata by the largest amount of production of Matrices in all gamesave.

Example: If there are 2 gamesave sharing the same cluster address, the output of Structure matrix is 900/min and 1800/min. Then the current cluster contribution is 1800.
data_array.fr_fr:
With <color="#FD965EBB">current cluster address</color>, obtain Metadata by the largest amount of production of Matrices in all gamesave.

Example: If there are 2 gamesave sharing the same cluster address, the output of Structure matrix is 900/min and 1800/min. Then the current cluster contribution is 1800.

data_array.name: 该存档已使用描述
data_array.zh_cn: 在当前存档中，已用于<color="#FD965EBB">买断科技</color>或已<color="#FD965EBB">提取</color>为矩阵放入背包中的元数据数量。
data_array.en_us: The amount of Metadata which is used for <color="#FD965EBB">buyout technology</color> or <color="#FD965EBB">realized</color> as matrices in current gamesave.
data_array.fr_fr: The amount of Metadata which is used for <color="#FD965EBB">buyout technology</color> or <color="#FD965EBB">realized</color> as matrices in current gamesave.

data_array.name: 该星团已使用描述
data_array.zh_cn: 在所有存档内，已用于<color="#FD965EBB">买断科技</color>或已<color="#FD965EBB">提取</color>为矩阵放入背包中的元数据总量。
data_array.en_us: The amount of Metadata which is used for <color="#FD965EBB">buyout technology</color> or <color="#FD965EBB">realized</color> as matrices in all gamesaves.
data_array.fr_fr: The amount of Metadata  which is used for <color="#FD965EBB">buyout technology</color> or <color="#FD965EBB">realized</color> as matrices in all gamesaves with current cluster address.

data_array.name: 新游戏沙盒模式提示描述
data_array.zh_cn:
这是一个抛开限制，释放想象力的模式!
在沙盒模式中，你可以在科技树中直接解锁科技，无限制地获得和使用物品，进行瞬间建造，并在星球之间自由穿梭，在浩瀚无垠的宇宙里随心所欲。
data_array.en_us:
This is a Mode which unleashes your limitless imagination!
In Sandbox Mode, you can unlock technologies directly in technology tree, unlimitedly generate and consume items, quick build, and freely travel between planets, do whatever you want in this universe.

data_array.zh_cn: 沙盒模式下已关闭成就

data_array.name: 清除自由轨道太阳帆
data_array.zh_cn: 立即清除未规划轨道的太阳帆

data_array.name: 清除轨道上太阳帆提示
data_array.zh_cn: 清除该轨道上的太阳帆
data_array.en_us: Remove Solar Sails in this orbit

data_array.name: 清除轨道上太阳帆描述
data_array.zh_cn:
点击立即抛弃该轨道上的全部太阳帆，包括在途的弹道和戴森壳转移途中的太阳帆。
（<color="#FD965EBB">无法恢复!!</color>）
data_array.en_us:
Click to remove all Solar Sails in this orbit immediately, including in-transit projectiles and Solar Sails are transfering to the Dyson Shell.
(<color="#FD965EBB">Cannot be recovered!!</color>)

data_array.name: 清除自由轨道太阳帆提示
data_array.zh_cn: 清除未规划轨道的太阳帆

data_array.name: 清除自由轨道太阳帆描述
data_array.zh_cn:
点击立即抛弃全部自由太阳帆（戴森球结构拆除后的残留，或是沙盒模式下手动发射的太阳帆）
（<color="#FD965EBB">无法恢复!!</color>）
data_array.en_us:
Click to remove all wild Solar Sails immediately (Remnants of the Dyson Sphere structure demolition, or manually launched by Icarus in Sandbox Mode)
(<color="#FD965EBB">Cannot be recovered!!</color>)

data_array.name: 清除全部太阳帆描述
data_array.zh_cn:
点击立即彻底移除该戴森球上的全部太阳帆。
（<color="#FD965EBB">无法恢复!!</color>）
data_array.en_us:
Click to remove all Solar Sails.
(<color="#FD965EBB">Cannot be recovered!!</color>)

data_array.name: 整理太阳帆内存描述
data_array.zh_cn:
（试验功能，不会有任何太阳帆被移除。）
太阳帆寿命到期后会留下内存空位，以便新发射的太阳帆能直接填补这些空位。若该戴森球不再大量弹射太阳帆，便可以点击该按钮来优化内存空间。
data_array.en_us:
(Experimental. No Solar Sails will be removed.) 
When the Solar Sail expires, Memory space are left blank so that the newly launched Solar Sails can fill these space directly.
If you no longer intend to launch a large number of Solar Sails, you can click this button to optimize the memory space.

data_array.name: 无限物品提示
data_array.zh_cn:
通过<color="#FD965EBB">流速监测器</color>的“货物过滤”来选择<color="#FD965EBB">生成/消耗</color>的货物。
通过设置监测周期和目标流量来控制货物生成/消耗的速度。
data_array.en_us:
Select item to be <color="#FD965EBB">generated/consumed</color> by "Item Filter" on <color="#FD965EBB">Monitor</color>.
Set the Monitoring Cycle and Target Flow to control the speed of  Generate/Consume.

data_array.name: 太阳帆无限寿命描述
data_array.zh_cn:
点击将该戴森球的太阳帆设置为无限寿命
（一旦设置，在清空太阳帆之前无法取消）
data_array.en_us:
Click to set Solar Sails eternal on this Dyson Sphere.
(Once set, it cannot be canceled until the solar sail is removed)

data_array.name: 太阳帆无限寿命已设置
